track.name: John The Revelator
comments: Another year gone by! I still love it.
Couldn't ask for any thing more that to have permission to add this to the minimalistism
Perfect
One of the last of the true bluesmen to live into our time. They won't be made like this ever again.
Powerful, even though he was not in the best of health.

I last commented on this in October 2011. I haven't changed my mind. This is not the only place I listen to it - I quite often play it in the car, and I sing along. Trouble is, I sing like an Engineer.
a capella a someness!
son house one of the greatest blues men of all time!!
Soul music
couldn't say it better serpentshade, my thoughts exactly
doesn't need any other instruments because son house's voice is one instrument & all instruments, one emotion & many emotions all at the same time.
pure madness!^^
Soul !
Finally the song "Cannon" makes sense now.
Wow, just heard Blind Willie Johnson's version of this same song. Great song, and I like both versions.
Hands down, one of the best songs I've ever listened to.
This is one of my all-time favourites. Who cares about keeping perfect time? - that's for cissies.
love it man!
